import { useState } from "react"; import {UseNewProduct} from '../hooks/UseNewProduct' const AddProduct = () => { const [title,setTitle] = useState('') const [price,setPrice] = useState() const [number,setNumber] = useState() const [instagram,setInstagram] = useState('') const [telegram,setTelegram] = useState('') const [category,setCategory] = useState('ورزش') const [about,setAbout] = useState('') const {error,isloading,NewProduct} = UseNewProduct() const submitHandler = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(category) await NewProduct(title,about,price,category,number,instagram,telegram) } return (

setTitle(e.target.value)} className="form-control text-end " />

setTelegram(e.target.value)} className="form-control text-end" placeholder="یوزرنیم تلگرام خود را بدون @ وارد کنید" />
{error &&

); } export default AddProduct;
